Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.) and Richard Blumenthal ( D-Conn.) accused House Republicans of pulling a`` bait and switch'' by focusing early on anti-abortion legislation instead of the economy. You probably recognize the Republican agenda as a radical departure from the days when they promised jobs, the senators wrote to Emily's List supporters Monday afternoon.`` And you know their claims of` limited government' shouldn't include limits on our access to health care.''
